original_title: Object Lessons, or: What Happened Whitsunday
overview: An American art collector’s estate plans to build a glass house that will permanently memorialize the collector’s many prints and paintings. The spot selected—several acres of undeveloped parkland in upstate New York—was the site of a young woman’s murder, the circumstances of which have been exploited for political purposes by the founder of a far-right populist party called National Advance.
title: Object Lessons, or: What Happened Whitsunday
